name: Early Access (Marzaroli, sharkwithlasers)
description:
--

Making games takes time and effort and sometimes bugs can still get through.  Take advantage of version control in this puzzle-platformer to  shift back and forth between patches and help us release this game!

--

Early Access was made for Weekly Game Jam 180  - Downgrade by two friends, Marzaroli and sharkwithlasers.  

We had a lot of fun making it so we hope you all enjoy it too!

--

Controls:

- A/D (or arrow keys) to move left/right

- K (or C) to jump

- LeftShift/RightShift to downgrade or upgrade patches

- R to restart level

- Hold Tab to view the current patch notes

(Esc to exit the application)

Tools Used:

- Unity (Shapes, ScriptableObjectArchitecture, DOTween) 

Extra shoutouts to the Shapes Unity asset.  So good.
